AssemblyStationMotorPool.name: Motor Pool
AssemblyStationMotorPool.description: An assembly station for producing light-duty logistics vehicles like trucks.

AssemblyStationNavalWorks.name: Naval Works
AssemblyStationNavalWorks.description: An assembly rigged to manufacture parts used in the construction of naval vessels at a Dry Dock.

AssemblyStationStructures.name: Advanced Structure Manufactory
AssemblyStationStructures.description: A workshop platform for the assembly of large, multi-part constructs such as the A0E-9 Rocket and Storm Cannon.

AssemblyStationBatteryLine.name: Battery Line
AssemblyStationBatteryLine.description: An assembly station for producing half-tracks and rocket vehicles.

AssemblyStationField.name: Field Station
AssemblyStationField.description: An assembly station for producing field weapons and utility vehicles such as Harvesters.

AssemblyStationTank.name: Tank Factory
AssemblyStationTank.description: An assembly station for producing tank class vehicles.

AssemblyStationWeapons.name: Weapons Platform
AssemblyStationWeapons.description: An assembly station for producing emplaced weapon platforms and specialized tanks.

AssemblyLargeAircraft.name: Aircraft Assembly
AssemblyLargeAircraft.description: An assembly station for producing advanced aircraft frames.

AssemblyLargeTrain.name: Train Assembly
AssemblyLargeTrain.description: An assembly station for producing train cars.

AssemblyLargeHeavyTank.name: Heavy Tank Assembly
AssemblyLargeHeavyTank.description: An assembly station for producing heavy tank class vehicles.
